rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a Scandinavian open-plan design combining the living area and kitchen, ensuring ample natural light.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.description: A modern Scandinavian kitchen with efficient layout, an integrated dining space, and accessibility features.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A compact, well-equipped private gym with designated storage for equipment, designed to be wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A cozy Scandinavian library space with bookshelves and comfortable seating, optimized for quiet study and relaxation.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible entry with minimal threshold.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: Scandinavian styled balcony offering a view and fresh air.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious Scandinavian master bedroom with a private en-suite bathroom, designed for comfort and accessibility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A Scandinavian styled bedroom with ample storage and accessible features for easy mobility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another comfortable, Scandinavian-themed bedroom designed with accessibility in mind.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest room featuring a Scandinavian design, ensuring ease of access and modern comfort.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible staircase with a lift option for accessibility.

openings.name: Balcony
openings.description: Scandinavian styled balcony on the first floor providing natural light and views.
